column8: DataElementConceptDefEN

column7: Identifiant du patient dans le centre transmetteur de l'information
Identifiant du centre transmetteur de l'information
Descriptif de la cause de décès du patient
Date de dernières nouvelles du patient (= date de dernière venue du patient si aucune autre information disponible)
Indicateur de l'état du patient aux dernières nouvelles (Vivant ou décédé)
Date limite de validité du consentement
Code international de la pathologie associée (hors autre cancer).
Date du diagnostic de la pathologie associée
Date de fin de la pathologie associée (si elle existe et est connue).
Date de diagnostic de l'antécédent carcinologique
Code international de la localisation de l'antécédent carcinologique
Code international de la lésion / type histologique / morphologie de l'antécédent carcinologique

Le champ 'Type' permet de décrire à la fois l'événement 'Cancer' en tant que maladie globale que les différents événements constituant cette maladie (Tumeur initiale, Récidive locale, Récidive métastatique).
Date de début de l'événement tumoral ou de la maladie
Définition de l'échelle d'autonomie (échelle de Karnofsky ou OMS)
outil d'évaluation de l'état général des patients âgés ayant un cancer
Taille de la tumeur, propagation sur le site de la tumeur primitive
Propagation à distance, présence de métastases
Liste des échelles de grading histologique
Date du diagnostic de l'événement tumoral
Code international de la localisation de l'événement tumoral
Code international de la lésion / type histologique / morphologie de l'événement tumoral
Latéralité de la localisation (si elle existe)
Traitement effectué dans un contexte d'étude clinique
Code international de l'événement indésirable survenu en cours de traitement (hors autre cancer).
Date du diagnostic de l'événement indésirable
Date de fin de l'événement indésirable (si elle est connue)
Identifiant unique de l'échantillon parent (s'il en existe un)
Numéro de référence du prélèvement (numéro utilisé généralement à la réception d'un ensemble d'échantillons au laboratoire correspondant à un même acte de prélèvement)
Nature du prélèvement d'origine (Sain ou Tumoral)
Le pourcentage de cellules tumorales quantifié dans l'échantillon

column8: Protocol used for the experiment
Technological platform name (provider followed by the platform name)
GEO Identifier of the platform
Date when the experiment was performed
Name of the panel targeted by the experimental analysis (provider + name)
Identifier of the pipeline used into the analysis (unique in the center)
Calculated percentage of tumor cells in sample
Calculated number of sets of chromosomes in a cell of the sample
Calculated number of break points in genomic profile
General type of the detected genetic alteration (high level type)
Conclusion of the biologist on the pathogenicity of the variant before the Molecular Tumor Board
Conclusion of the clinicians wether the variant is actionable or not during the Molecular Tumor Board
Is the ClinicalTumorBoardConclusion used to orient the treatment decision ?
Type of validation of the detected alteration
Validation method depending on the type of validation
Validation status of the detected alteration
Chromosome containing the genetic finding
Nucleotide location for start of genomic finding on the positive (+) genomics strand, 1-based
Nucleotide location for end of genomic finding on the positive (+) genomic strand, 1-based
Genome Build used for reference
Cytogenetic location
Type of the genome entity. For eg: gene, mRNA, ncRNA...
Database of the genome entity
Identifier of the genome entity in the genome entity database
Hugo gene symbol
Type of the fusion event. For eg: translocation, readthrough
Gene symbol (HUGO) of the gene involved in the fusion on 5 prime end
Human readable name for the region of interest from the 5 prime fusion partner. For eg : Exon, Intron
Reference identifier for cDNA transcript of the 5 prime fusion partner, with version, from NCBI's RefSeq or ENSEMBL.
Strand of the 5 prime fusion partner
Position of the fusion point on the 5 prime partner
Gene symbol (HUGO) of the gene involved in the fusion on 3 prime end
Human readable name for the region of interest from the 3 prime fusion partner. For eg : Exon, Intron
Reference identifier for cDNA transcript of the 3 prime fusion partner, with version, from NCBI's RefSeq or ENSEMBL.
Strand of the 3 prime fusion partner
Position of the fusion point on the 3 prime partner
Specify whether the fusion is in frame
Number of reads pairs spanning the fusion
Number of reads containing the fusion point
Intensity of the measured signal
Copy number status
Estimated DNA copy number
Is the segment located in a region of loss of heterozygosity ? (can be independant from copy number information
Plus strand reference allele at this position. Include the sequence deleted for a deletion, or '-' for an insertion.
Plus strand observed alternative allele at this position. Include the sequence inserted for a insertion, or '-' for a deletion.
Codified type of the DNA sequence variation
Pfams domains related to alteration position
Identifier of Pfams domains related to alteration position
Algorithm to predict the variation effect over the protein
Prediction of the variation effect over the protein
Level of confidence of the prediction of the variation effect over the protein
Human readable name for the region of interest related to the transcript (eg: exon1, intron1, UTR3')
HGVS nomenclature on the chosen transcript
HGVS nomenclature on the chosen protein transcript
HGVS nomenclature on the given GenomeReferenceSequenceId.
HGVS nomenclature on the given TranscriptReferenceSequenceId and experimentely observed on RNA.
HGVS nomenclature of changes at protein-level
Total sequencing depth at the variant position observed in the specimen
Sequencing depth of the alternative allele at the variant position observed in the specimen
Indication of the existence of strand bias at the variant position
Genomic class of the variant (eg: germline, somatic, and prenatal)
Level of allelic occurrence of a DNA Sequence Variation
Type of the expression value corresponding to the level of data processing
Numerical value for expression
